original_text: They also took all their animals and everything that they had got in Canaan. In that way, Jacob and all his family went to Egypt.
korean_text: 그들의 가축과 가나안 땅에서 얻은 재물을 이끌었으며 야곱과 그의 자손들이 다함께 애굽으로 갔더라

sentences.original_text: They also took all their animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 모든 가축들을 데리고 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and everything that they had got in Canaan
Jacob and all his family went to Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱과 그의 모든 가족은 이집트로 갔습니다
